GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
tipc: check attribute length for bearer name

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 8b91d0dfc839e67708c905648cd0e7507a2263e5, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit cb30a63384bc91d5da06e1cede1115f666a29271. For more details please see the references link.
